questions.question: In the following sentence identify Verb (past tense).
questions.comprehension: Sometime later , a few hunters captured the lion , and tied him to a tree .

questions.question: Select appropiate Verb (base form) from the following to fill the black in the sentence.
questions.comprehension: After that they went in search of a wagon , to _____________ him to the zoo .

questions.question: Select appropiate Verb (past tense) from the following to fill the black in the sentence.
questions.comprehension: The lion was so tickled by the idea of the mouse being able to help him that he _____________ his paw and let him go .

questions.question: In the following sentence identify Adverb.
questions.comprehension: Sometime later , a few hunters captured the lion , and tied him to a tree .

questions.question: In the following sentence identify Preposition or subordinating conjunction.
questions.comprehension: The lion was so tickled by the idea of the mouse being able to help him that he lifted his paw and let him go .

questions.question: Select appropiate Verb (past tense) from the following to fill the black in the sentence.
questions.comprehension: After that they _____________ in search of a wagon , to take him to the zoo .

questions.explanation: by is Preposition or subordinating conjunction
questions.question: Select appropiate Preposition or subordinating conjunction from the following to fill the black in the sentence.
questions.comprehension: The lion was so tickled _____________ the idea of the mouse being able to help him that he lifted his paw and let him go .

questions.explanation: lion is Singular or mass Noun
questions.question: Select appropiate Singular or mass Noun from the following to fill the black in the sentence.

questions.explanation: that is Preposition or subordinating conjunction
questions.question: Select appropiate Preposition or subordinating conjunction from the following to fill the black in the sentence.
questions.comprehension: After _____________ they went in search of a wagon , to take him to the zoo .
